DOC.brief_summary: Study Assess Safety Cat-PAD Cat Allergic Paediatric Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Male female , age 512 year . Moderate severe rhinoconjunctivitis exposure cat least 2 year . Subjects may optionally also GINA Step 1 control asthma . Positive skin prick test cat hair . Cat dander specific IgE â‰¥0.35 kU/L . Exclusion Criteria Asthma fall GINA definition `` partly control '' `` uncontrolled '' Steps 2 5 . FEV1 < 80 % predict . Clinically relevant abnormality detect physical examination . History severe drug allergy , severe angioedema anaphylactic reaction food .
